Package com.teamten.render

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Light
    Represents a light source and the algorithm to light a point.
    Material
    Can shade a material given a list of lights and an intersection point.
    RayTracer
    Interface for tracing rays and shading points.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AmbientOcclusionMaterial
    Implements the ambient occlusion material.
    BoundingBox
    Represents an axis-aligned box that bounds some geometry, including a list of that geometry and possible nested bounding boxes.
    Color
    Represents an immutable ARGB color.
    DirectionalLight
    Represents an infinitely far away directional light.
    Intersection
    Records the results of an intersection hit.
    PhongMaterial
    Implementation of the Phong shading model.
    Renderer
    A renderer from geometry to image files.
    Triangle
    Represents an immutable triangle in 3D.
    TriangleComparator
    Compares triangles for sorting.
    UrtConnection
    Serves a particular connection from an URT controller.
    UrtServer
    Serves ray-tracing for the URT (universal ray-tracer) infrastructure.
    Vertex
    Immutable structure to store all information about a triangle vertex.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DegenerateTriangleException
    Thrown when a degenerate triangle is created.
